channel.title: CoinGecko API Documentation
channel.description: CoinGecko API Documentation: API references, tutorial guides, and more. Get all the crypto market data you need: coins, NFTs, onchain DEX, live prices, metadata, historical data & more. Made for developers & traders.

item.title: Now Supported: Launchpad Data (Pump.fun & More), Granular OHLCV, and Honeypot Info
item.description: We're excited to announce a major update to our on-chain API endpoints! This release introduces support for popular token launchpads, adds high-frequency OHLCV data, and enhances our honeypot detection capabilities to give you deeper and more timely on-chain insights.
item.dc:creator: SA

item.title: Update Frequency Improvements for selected Pro-API endpoints (March 2025)
item.description: [Changes below are applicable to Analyst/Lite/Pro/Enterprise plan subscribers only.]
item.dc:creator: SA

item.title: New Megafilter Endpoint, 200+ Chains Supported: Hyperliquid, Abstract, Berachain & MOAR!
item.description: Powered by GeckoTerminal, the CoinGecko API now supports on-chain data across 200+ blockchain networks, including the latest additions: Hyperliquid, HyperEVM, Abstract, Berachain, Story, Monad, Unichain, and Soneium.
item.dc:creator: SA

item.title: Improved Update Frequency for selected Pro-API On-chain Endpoints
item.description: [Changes below are applicable to all paid plan subscribers.]
item.dc:creator: SA

item.title: [Updated: Q4 2024] CoinGecko Asset Issuance Standardisation Initiative Updates
item.description: As part of our commitment to improving data quality and enhancing the consistency of asset information, we are rolling out an asset standardization initiative at CoinGecko.
item.dc:creator: SA

item.title: Upcoming Change Notice: Removal of normalized_volume_btc Data
item.description: Notice: Upcoming Change to CoinGecko API Endpoints - Removal ofnormalized_volume_btc Data
item.dc:creator: SA

item.title: Upcoming Change Notice: Removal of twitter_followers Data
item.description: Notice: Upcoming Change to CoinGecko API Endpoints - Removal oftwitter_followers Data
item.dc:creator: SA

item.title: Enhanced Onchain Metadata, Increased Max Address Limit for Multi Endpoints, Improved Exchange Tickers Sorting
item.description: Onchain Metadata: Improved Coverage
item.dc:creator: SA

item.title: SOL Currency Is Now Supported for CoinGecko Endpoints
item.description: We're excited to announce that you can now obtain real-time and historical price & market data for tokens listed on CoinGecko.com, with the option to return data value in SOL (Solana) currency.
item.dc:creator: SA

item.title: Update Frequency Improvements for selected Pro-API endpoints
item.description: [Changes below are applicable to Analyst/Lite/Pro/Enterprise plan subscribers only.]
item.dc:creator: SA

item.title: Introduced /key endpoint
item.description: We've introduced a new endpoint /key for conveniently monitoring your account's API usage, including rate limits and remaining credits.
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Multiple Improvements (Onchain/GT)
item.description: image_url is now returned in the token response for pools and tokens endpoints:Example of responses:<button type="button" value="json">JSON</button> "data": { "id": "eth_0xdac17f958d2ee523a2206206994597c13d831ec7", "type": "token", "attributes": { "address": "0xdac17f958d2ee523a220620699...
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Introduced /networks/{network}/trending_pools endpoint (Onchain/GT)
item.description: Trending Pools endpoint, /networks/{network}/trending_pools is now available to fetch a list of pools that are trending as seen on GeckoTerminal based on web visits and on-chain activities.
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Deprecated response fields for /coins/{id}
item.description: The following data is now deprecated for /coins/{id} endpoint:
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Multiple Improvements
item.description: The web_slug data is now available in the following endpoints.
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Multiple Improvements: Onchain Pools Page Limit, Trades Token Filter
item.description: Onchain Pools Data: Supports more than 10 pages of data
item.dc:creator: SA

item.title: New Endpoint & Improvements: On-Chain Trades, Net Buy Volume, and More
item.description: [Pro-API Exclusive] New Endpoint - On-chain Trades by Token Address
item.dc:creator: SA

item.title: Removal of Unsupported Categories
item.description: Upcoming Removal of Unsupported Categories from CoinGecko and CoinGecko API
item.dc:creator: SA

item.title: Improved Update Frequency for selected Pro-API endpoints
item.description: [Changes below are applicable to Analyst/Lite/Pro/Enterprise plan subscribers only.]
item.dc:creator: SA

item.title: Multiple Improvement: Holders data, Pool Stats, Simple Token Price
item.description: Onchain Token Info endpoints - Holders data
item.dc:creator: SA

item.title: Introduced /coins/{id}/ohlc/range endpoint
item.description: We've introduced a new endpoint /coins/{id}/ohlc/range.
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Introduced /search/pools endpoint (Onchain/GT)
item.description: Added new endpoint to search for pools /search/pools based on keywords passed into query.
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Included new fields - NFT data
item.description: We've added 'user_favorites_count', and 'ath' (all-time-high) related data to the following NFT endpoints:
item.dc:creator: SA

item.title: Included new field for /coins/{id} endpoint
item.description: We've included a new field "whitepaper" under "links" section for /coins/{id} endpoint
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Included more trending coins
item.description: We've expanded the capabilities of the /search/trending endpoint.
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Introduced historical circulating supply endpoint
item.description: We've introduced the Historical Circulating Supply endpoint exclusively for Enterprise plan subscribers.
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Added interval hourly params to /coins/{id}/ohlc
item.description: We've expanded functionality to include support for the interval=hourly parameter within the /coins/{id}/ohlc endpoint.
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Improvement of update frequency for OHLC endpoints
item.description: The cache & update frequency of the following endpoints have been improved from every 30 minutes to every 15 minutes:
item.dc:creator: SA

item.title: Extended Historical Data for Onchain OHLCV Endpoint
item.description: What’s New?
item.dc:creator: SA

item.title: Added support for inactive coins in /coins/list and historical data endpoints
item.description: We've now enhanced the /coins/list endpoint to include inactive coins
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Improvement on pool data (Onchain/GT)
item.description: Pool data now returns transaction stats for the last 1 hour. Unique buyers and sellers in the last 1 hour and 24 hours are now returned in the response
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Enhancing Your Access to Even Fresher Data!
item.description: [Changes below are applicable to Analyst/Lite/Pro/Enterprise plan subscribers only.]
item.dc:creator: SA

item.title: Introduced /coins/top_gainer_losers endpoint
item.description: We've added /coins/top_gainers_losers endpoint exclusively for Paid Plan Subscribers.
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Introduced /coins/{id}/ohlc endpoint
item.description: We've introduced new /coins/{id}/ohlc endpoint.
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Introduced new endpoints (Onchain/GT)
item.description: Added new endpoints to allow querying multiple pools and tokens in a single API call. /networks/{network}/pools/multi/{addresses} and /networks/{network}/tokens/multi/{addresses}
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Included new fields (Onchain/GT)
item.description: More data added to the Pool response such as FDV, market cap (from CoinGecko if available), price change percentage, volume, number of buy/sell transactionsMore data added when querying for token such as FDV, volume, market cap, and the top 3 pools
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Increased Rate Limit (Onchain/GT)
item.description: We've increased the rate limit of Public Plan from 10 calls per minute to 30 calls per minute
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Included new fields
item.description: We've added "links" field (e.g. homepage, twitter, discord) to these NFT endpoints responses:
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Introduced new historical total supply endpoints
item.description: We've introduced Historical Total Supply data to Enterprise plan subscribers via these 2 exclusive endpoints:
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Introduced /networks/{network}/pools/{pool_address}/trades endpoint (Onchain/GT)
item.description: You can now get the latest 300 trades in the past 24 hours of a given pool from this endpoint /networks/{network}/pools/{pool_address}/trades. You may optionally filter by trade size as well. You can now build your own telegram bot alert!
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Update to Total Supply of POW Coins
item.description: What’s Changing?
item.dc:creator: SA

item.title: Included new fields (Onchain/GT)
item.description: Pool response data now returns price in the base and quote token of the pool base_token_price_quote_token and quote_token_price_base_token for your convenience without the need to do additional calculation to derive these values
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Introduced new endpoints and improvements
item.description: We've added new /global/market_cap_chart endpoint for Paid Plan Subscribers. This allows users to query historical market cap chart data.
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Included new fields to multiple endpoints
item.description: We have added a new field, "details_platform," to the /coins/{id} and /coins/{asset_platform_id}/contract/{contract_address} endpoints responses.
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Introduced /simple/networks/{network}/token_price/{addresses} endpoint (Onchain/GT)
item.description: Inspired by CoinGecko API most popular endpoint, we have launched the /simple/networks/{network}/token_price/{addresses}, simple endpoint. Simply pass in addresses of any tokens on supported blockchain and get price data for it
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Multiple Improvements: Onchain Trending Pools, CG New Currencies Support, Snapshot, Exchange Info
item.description: Onchain Trending Pools: Added Support to Filter by Duration
item.dc:creator: SA

item.title: Introduced new endpoints (Onchain/GT)
item.description: You can now fetch token information such as name, image, social links, and description via these endpoints:
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Included new fields to /exchanges/{id}
item.description: We've enhanced the /exchanges/{id} endpoint by adding two new fields, public_notice and alert_notice.
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: New Endpoint & Multiple Improvements: On-Chain Top Token Holder Address, Security Data, Historical Supply.
item.description: [Pro-API Exclusive] New Endpoint - Top Token Holder Address Data
item.dc:creator: SA

item.title: Introduced /search/trending endpoint
item.description: We've introduced new /search/trending endpoint.
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Introduced category filter params to /coins/markets
item.description: We've implemented a category filter, currently limited to "decentralized_finance_defi," for the /coins/markets endpoint.
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Introduced /exchange/{id}/volume_chart/range endpoint
item.description: We've introduced the /exchange/{id}/volume_chart/range endpoint for Paid Plan Subscribers.
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Introduced new NFT endpoints
item.description: We've added exclusive NFTs beta endpoints for Paid Plan Subscribers. These endpoints include:
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Introduced NFTs and Token Lists Endpoints
item.description: We've introduced beta endpoints for NFTs:
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Improved 5-minutely data for Historical Chart Data endpoints
item.description: For the following 4 historical chart endpoints, the data of the last 48 hours from now is no longer excluded.
item.dc:creator: SA

item.title: Set default params value for /coins/markets
item.description: To minimize bandwidth usage, the /coins/markets endpoint will now automatically default to retrieving data for the top 100 coins by market cap when the 'ids' parameter is left blank.
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Multiple Improvements: Global Market Chart, Asset Platforms, Coin Categories, Historical Supply Chart
item.description: Global Market Chart - Improved Daily Data Update
item.dc:creator: SA

item.title: Multiple Improvements: Onchain Token Price, NFT Market Cap
item.description: Onchain Simple Token Price: Added Market Cap and 24h Volume Data
item.dc:creator: SA

item.title: New Endpoints & Improvements: Historical Token Holders Chart, OHLCV by Token Address, Multi-pool Token Data Support
item.description: [Pro-API Exclusive] New Endpoint - Historical Token Holders Chart by Token Address
item.dc:creator: SA

item.title: Set default params value for tickers endpoints
item.description: We've implemented an enhancement to the /coins/{id}/tickers and /exchanges/{id}/tickers endpoints.
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Introduced finance and derivatives endpoints
item.description: We have introduced finance and derivatives endpoints to our API.
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Improved OHLCV endpoint (Onchain/GT)
item.description: /networks/{network}/pools/{pool_address}/ohlcv/{timeframe} now returns more granularity day, hour, minute and multiple aggregates
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Multiple Improvements (Onchain/GT)
item.description: base_token_native_currency and quote_token_native_currency added to the pools endpoint response. This allows you to obtain price in the network's native currency in addition to in USDreserve_in_usd added to the pools endpoint response. This returns the total liquidity/reserve of the pool in USDpool_...
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Multiple Improvements (Onchain/GT)
item.description: Token metadata such as name, symbol, and CoinGecko ID are now returned in the responses for pools endpoints. Users will need to pass in this attribute include=base_token, quote_tokenCoinGecko asset platform ID added to the response for /networks endpoint
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Introduced optional params for multiple endpoints
item.description: Added coin_ids optional params to /exchanges/{id}/tickers endpoint. Users can specify the coin_ids to get the exchanges tickers for a particular coin.
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Added: Onchain Categories Data, CG data improvements
item.description: NEW: Onchain Categories : Get Categories on GeckoTerminal.com
item.dc:creator: SA

item.title: Added interval daily params to /coins/{id}/ohlc
item.description: The /coins/{id}/ohlc endpoint now supports the "interval=daily" parameter for Paid Plan Subscribers
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Introduced /coins/list/new endpoint
item.description: We've introduced the /coins/list/new endpoint for Paid Plan Subscribers.
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Improved /coins/{id} endpoint
item.description: To ensure the consistent uptime and scalability of this API, we can only provide a maximum of 100 tickers in the responses across multiple exchanges through the /coins/{id} endpoint.
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Introduced /exchanges/{id}/volume_chart
item.description: We have added a new endpoint, /exchanges/{id}/volume_chart.
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Multiple Improvements
item.description: We've made enhancements to the /search/trending and /coins/{asset_platform_id}/contract/{contract_address} endpoints:
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: New Endpoint & Improvements: On-Chain Trending Data, Enhanced Trending Search, and Improved Token Lookup
item.description: [Pro-API Exclusive] New Endpoint - On-chain Trending Search Data
item.dc:creator: SA

item.title: Introduced precision params for other endpoints
item.description: The uses of 'precision' parameter allows to specify price data in full or 0-18 decimals, and previously was only made available for /simple/price and /simple/token_price/{id} endpoints.
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Deprecated event endpoint
item.description: Event endpoint deprecated
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Reduced the usage of /coins (paginated) endpoint
item.description: Recognizing the limitations of the paginated /coins feature, particularly its inability to query for specific coins, we have temporarily hidden it from the documentation to prevent confusion for new users.
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Improved /exchanges/{id} endpoint
item.description: To ensure the consistent uptime and scalability of this API, we can only provide a maximum of 100 tickers in the responses for a specific exchange through the /exchanges/{id} endpoint.
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Increased Requests Per Minute (RPM)
item.description: Due the substantial volume of requests we've received, we are adjusting the API rate for Public API to 100 requests per minute, allowing for over 4 million requests per month.
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Included new fields
item.description: We have introduced two new fields, last_traded_at and last_fetched_at, to the ticker data.
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Included new fields to /coins/markets
item.description: We've introduced three new fields atl, atl_change_percentage, and atl_date to the responses of /coins/markets endpoint.
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Included new fields
item.description: We've added 'watchlist_portfolio_users' field to /coins/{id} endpoint responses.
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Improved /coins/{id}/tickers
item.description: Starting from April 14th, 2020, there's a crucial update to the /coins/{id}/tickers API endpoint. Previously, the converted_last value represented the converted price per coin in USD. Now, it will accurately reflect the market price of the base currency itself.
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Introduced /exchanges/list endpoint
item.description: We have introduced a new endpoint: /exchanges/list.
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Included new fields
item.description: We've added "symbol" field to these NFT endpoints responses:
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Included new trust score field to tickers
item.description: We have added trust_score field to /coins/{id}/tickers and /exchanges/{id}/tickers endpoints
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Multiple Improvements
item.description: We've made some updates to the /coins/categories and /simple/token_price/{id} endpoints:
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Multiple Improvements: Onchain Simple Price, Onchain Recently Updated Info, NFT Collection Data
item.description: Onchain: Simple Price - Increased Token Address Limit from 30 to 100
item.dc:creator: SA

item.title: Introduced /simple endpoints
item.description: In response to user feedback requesting reduced API payloads, we have introduced our /simple endpoints, offering simplified responses.
item.dc:creator: haoxiang

item.title: Updated params for /derivatives endpoint
item.description: We have made updates to the include_tickers parameter for /derivatives/exchanges/{id} endpoint.
item.dc:creator: haoxiang
